Vay theo lng

M T SN PHM


Vay theo lng tn chp tr gp l mt hnh thc ca vay tn chp. Tc ngi i vay khng cn phi c ti sn th chp, khng cn ngi bo lnh vay, m ch cn chng minh c mc lng v cng vic hin ti ca mnh.

Da trn c s , ngn hng s xem xt bng lng, giy xc nhn lng nu nhn lng tin mt, hoc sao k ti khon nu nhn lng qua th duyt h s vay cho khch hng theo mc lng.

Hin ti Vay tin Nng chp nhn duyt vay nu khch hng nhn lng qua bt c ngn hng no trong nc. V d: Bidv, Agribank, Acb, Vietinbank, Vietcombank, Vpbank, Techcombank, Sacombank, Prudential, Ocenbank, HD

U IM KHI VAY THEO LNG

c vay ln n 10 ln lng.
Thi gian vay ti thiu l 09 thng, thi gian vay ti a l 36 thng.
c quyn tt ton khon vay khi hon thnh xong 4 k ng ph
Sng ti h khu hay tm tr u c vay.
H s vay n gin, nhn tin vay nhanh ch trong 02 03 ngy.

IU KIN C VAY


c xt duyt vay tr gp theo lng, khch hng cn p ng c nhng yu cu sau:

  • Lng >= 3.000.000 ng/ thng.

 

LI XUT VAY HIN HNH


Li sut p dng cho sn phm vay theo lng ph thuc vo quy m cng ty. Vi nhng cng ty c quy m ln, mc li sut s thp hn nhng cng ty c quy m nh hn. c bit, trong thng ny Ngn Hng SHB h tr mc li sut u i hn so vi trc y (Gim 0.05%) c th nh sau:

Tiu ch CAT A CAT B CAT C
M t L nhng cng ty, tp on ln. Vd: FPT, Khatoco, Yn So L nhng cng ty c thi gian hot ng >= 03 nm L nhng cng ty c thi gian hot ng < 02 nm v > 01 nm
Li sut 1.76% 2.17% 2.95%


Bng li sut u i p dng thng ny

V d: Vi 1.000.000 ng khch hng ch mt 17.600 ng tin li (Mc li sut 1.76%).

H S VAY YU CU


rt ngn thi gian duyt h s v nhanh chng nhn tin vay, khch hng vui lng chun b bn photo ca cc loi giy t sau:

Chng minh nhn dn.
S h khu (Photo nguyn cun, bao gm nhng trang cha ghi ch).
S tm tr (Ch dng trong tng hp a ch sinh sng hin ti khc phng vi a ch trn s h khu).
Giy t chng minh cng vic: Hp ng lao ng/ Quyt nh b nhim Trng hp khng c hoc tht lc hp ng lao ng, khch hng c th s dng mu Xc nhn cng tc (Hoc mu gp xc nhn lng & xc nhn cng tc) lm giy t chng minh cng vic.
Giy t chng minh thu nhp: Bng lng/ Phiu lng/ Sao k lng Trng hp nhn lng tin mt hoc khng c giy t chng minh thu nhp, khch hng c th s dng mu Xc nhn lng (Hoc mu gp xc nhn lng & xc nhn cng tc) lm giy t chng minh thu nhp.

Lu , ton b h s vay khch hng cn phi c bn gc nhn vin t vn i chiu trc tip khi lm h s.

H TR M TH TN DNG NGN HNG VIB

); } export default VayTheoLuong
